reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt to be of good quality and appreciate its warmth, with one mentioning it keeps them cozy during fall weather. They describe it as super soft, comfortable, and well-fitting, with one noting it hits at the top of the hip. Customers like its style, with one highlighting the cute drawstring tie detail, and they appreciate its thickness, with one noting it's perfect for multiple temperatures.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, cute, quality!
items.body: I am 5â€™6â€, 125 lbs, I got a small and it fits me really well. When cinched it comes right about where my belly button is, so if you like sweatshirts to be bigger and more roomy then you may want to size up. The quality seems good! There were two little tiny loose threads I had to snip off near the zipper but thatâ€™s no big deal. Itâ€™s light weight but just thick enough to be v cozy and warm. Soft and plush. I like that it can be styled different ways depending on how much you zip it up and whether or not you use the cinch at the bottom. You can leave the cinch out or tuck it under. Love the forest green color! In the product picture it looks a bit more of an emerald but itâ€™s really a true forest green like the color of fresh pine needles. I am happy with my purchase and will be wearing this often I think :) Read more
items.author: Hannah Hansen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money!
items.body: I was extremely surprised when this sweatshirt came in. It is thick, warm, and SO soft/cozy. I love that it's not at all too thick to where you have that gross, almost suffocating, sweaty feeling. It literally just feels high quality. I also love that the sleeves go over the tops of my hands, which I've found is surprisingly hard to come by with buying long-sleeved anything off Amazon. The forest green color is so gorgeous and I'm so glad I chose it. The tie option at the bottom works great and helps give it more of a cute shape, but honestly I love how it looks both ways. The only very minor gripe that I have is the zipper can be a bit sticky when trying to zip it up, but it's fine when you're zipping it down. All in all, I truly do think the fairly hefty price point reflects the quality of this sweatshirt. I'm usually an XS but the smallest size offered was small so that's what I got and it fits exactly how I wanted it to. Slightly baggy to where I can where tops underneath if I wanted to! Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute
items.body: For reference Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ and 155. I normally take a size medium and thatâ€™s what I ordered. Item is TTS. Gorgeous raspberry color. Texture is soft and and not too thick or bulky; just right for fall workout gear. Love the stitching and detail around the front. Half zipper is great, but what I love is the drawstring at the bottom so I can cinch the top in if I want. I also like that it hits at the top of the hip! Love it and buying in more colors. Buy this top now!!! Read more
items.author: Avid Reader

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, cropped half-zip sweatshirtâ€”just size up
items.body: This QINSEN half-zip sweatshirt is a cozy, stylish pick for colder seasons great for at-home comfort or casual outings. Just be sure to size up and be prepared for the cropped style. If you love the mock-neck cozy vibe, this is a solid affordable option! Read more
items.author: Leslie B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect fall and winter athletic sweater!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This mock neck sweatshirt surprised me by now nice and thick it felt when first taking it out of the packaging. It is incredibly warm and comfy and I see myself wearing it a lot during the fall and winter. It fits true to size, and has an adjustable tie on bottom to make it larger and boxier or smaller and more form fitting. I like wearing it both ways. The color is SO pretty, I just love cream - it pairs well with everything! I like this sweater so much, I think Iâ€™m going to buy it in multiple colors ðŸ˜ Read more
items.author: Nikki

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great fabric - so soft!
items.body: This exceeded my expectations! Expensive feeling fabric (better than SKIMS to me) but at half the cost! Read more
items.author: Jeff Lund

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars COMFY,COZY SWEATER
items.body: Very comfy sweater, great quality. I gave it 4 stars due to the tie, not staying tied. Also, zipper doesn't stay closed at the top. I kept it since I bought it for the gym and as a layer for my coat in the colder months. Originally I bought a medium based on my measurements, I'm 5'9, 160lbs. I exchanged it for a large so it's longer in the arms. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most comfortable!
items.body: Worth it, worth it, worth it! I was looking for a cute sweater to go over my workout clothes are just to run errands, and I love the arm length, thick, great quality, and warm! Read more
items.author: Jessica Montgomery

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Forest Green, Moonlight, Smoke Blue, Dark Grey, Apricot, Chocolate, Black, Cabaret. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
